column4: i have two questions: i installed the textbased alternate of ubuntu and everytime i install software, which ist available on the cd too, the system asks me to instert the cd. is there a way of activating "download everything"?
the second: do i need du edit my sources.list like in edgy?
open up sources manager and uncheck the cd
windows first then ubuntu that way when grub is installed it will see the windows and add it to the boot menu
